Involved in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle SDLC including analysis design development and testing of the project Used SpringBoot to create standalone spring applications Used Spring Boot for building Micro services and developed Spring based application radically faster with very less configuration Designed and developed Micro services business components using SpringBoot Used configure business process and management rules Developed Application to asses JSON and XML from RESTful web service from consumer side using JavaScript and Angular 2 Experience in implementing J2EE Design Patterns like MVC DAO and Singleton Worked on the REST Web Services and used Spring Framework and developed the Spring Features Extensively used Core Java such as MultiThreading Exceptions and application to the company to perform the relationship between the corporate user and consultants We develop this application for the user to communicate with the HR department like to apply the leave request and to submit the time sheets The time sheet is tracked based on BPM flow Responsibilities Involved in complete SDLC management Requirements gathering Design Analysis Development and Testing Analyzed object oriented design and developed sequence and class diagrams using UML Developed UI using HTML JavaScript and JSP and developed Business Logic and Interfacing components using Business Objects and JDBC Designed and Implemented XML based services conforming to OPEN API standard Implemented various SOAP based service clients to interact with 3rd party soap services Managed
